content: I have our new Binderhub working with https and GitHub authentication now! Feel free to give it a try!

Worked wonderfully for me! Incredible, thanks Kevin. A small piece of feedback:
image.png
Something Julien did for Unidata Science Gateway was to set this up so that it shows as a request from the Unidata GitHub organization instead of his personal account. I'm not sure what it takes to get there, but could be an option on the horizon for us!
Thanks Drew ... yes, I will reach out to Julien if I can't figure it out myself, since it would be better to show the request as coming from an organization, not one's personal GH account.
@Drew Camron This should be fixed now ... please give it a try and confirm!
